二、教學大綱

【授課方式：16+2週】彈性授課方式為數位多媒體學習與自主線上學習。

授課教師

黃昱倫

教學進度與主題

第一週 Introduction (syllabus and expectations)

*   Introduction to Manual Therapies
*   Muscle Imbalance- Overactive vs Underactive
*   Corrective Exercise Continuum

第二週

*   Human Movement System Impairment
*   Static Postural & Movement Assessment -1

第三週 Static Postural & Movement Assessment -2

第四週 Tissue and Neuromuscular Factors associated with ROM: ROM Restoration

第五週

*   Effects of Immobilization on Tissue
*   Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation Stretching Techniques -1

第六週 Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation Stretching Techniques -2

第七週 Principles of Joint Mobilization -1

第八週 Principles of Joint Mobilization - 2

第九週 Midterm Presentation - Static Postural & Movement Assessment

第十週 Sport Massage, Massage Lubricants & Principles and Physiology of Massage

第十一週 Massage & Myofascial Release -1

第十二週 Massage & Myofascial Release -2

第十三週 Principles and Physiology of Traction & Positional Release

第十四週 Muscle Energy

第十五週 Final Presentation

第十六週 Final Examination
